short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Microsoft Copilot visible on every page in the side panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Microsoft Copilot Sidepanel Extension
------------------------------------------------------------

Supercharge your productivity with the Microsoft Copilot Sidepanel Extension! This extension brings the power of Microsoft Copilot directly into your browser, allowing you to access intelligent suggestions and insights in a convenient side panel, without disrupting your workflow.

Key Features:
---------------------

AI-Powered Assistance: Get real-time suggestions, task automation, and insights from Microsoft Copilot, all from a simple side panel.

Seamless Integration: Easily work on documents, emails, or projects while Copilot offers valuable help in the background.

Multitasking Made Easy: Keep your focus on the main task while Copilot assists with writing, editing, and data analysis.

Efficient and Unobtrusive: A sleek design that fits neatly into your browser, offering assistance when you need it without taking up space.

Boost your productivity and streamline your work with the Microsoft Copilot Sidepanel Extension. Download now and let Copilot assist you in achieving more!
